sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"做，制造"之意。
means: make ： 普通用词，很常用，含义广，既可指制造具体的东西，也可指完成一种行为。
fabricate ： 特指按照标准样式制作或把材料或部件组合成一个整体。
manufacture ： 正式用词，一般指用机器大规模地批量生产各种生活或生产用品。
produce ： 普通用词，侧重大量地生产出各种生产用品和生活用品。强调结果。也用于引申。

sentence.Network_en: They plan to fabricate a cinema next year.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们计划明年建造一座电影院.

sentence.Network_en: Tito had never had an occasion to fabricate an ingenious lie before.
sentence.Network_cn: 蒂托从前还没有机会制造一个货真价值的谎话.

sentence.Network_en: Compound surfaces are more difficult and expensive to fabricate.
sentence.Network_cn: 复合的表面在制造上更困难,花费也更大.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 捏字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 捏一把汗〖 beseizedwithfear〗 捏造〖 fabricate;concoct;fake;invent〗 捏 niē.
虚字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 虚功〖 virtualwork〗 虚构〖 makeup;fabricate〗 虚构〖 fabrication〗.
营造_百度百科 ... [make] 制作;做 [fabricate] 构造,编造 [construct;build] 建造.
罪犯外表很delicate(纤弱的) *其实最擅长fabricate(伪造) *关键是把她locate(确定位置) *

list.abs: 国际贸易>风电词汇中英文对照表 ... eye screw 螺丝眼 fabrication 制造；生产；结构 faceplate 面板, 花盘.
银鱼的部落 - 银鱼 - 网易博客 ... 001，里料： LINING 002，面料： FABRIC 003，平纹： TAFFETA.
CGTextures|CGmap|CG贴图网 ... 雕塑 Sculpture 织物 Fabric 绘画 Painting.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin fabricat- 'manufactured', from the verb fabricare, from fabrica 'something skilfully produced' (see fabric)

entry.def: If someone fabricates information, they invent it in order to deceive people.

example.ex: All four claim that officers fabricated evidence against them...
example.tran: 4 人全都声称警察捏造证据陷害他们。

example.ex: Eleven key officials were hanged on fabricated charges.
example.tran: 11位高官因莫须有的罪名被处以绞刑。

entry.def: If something is fabricated from different materials or substances, it is made out of those materials or substances.

example.ex: All the tools are fabricated from high quality steel.
example.tran: 所有工具均由精钢制成。
一家制造飞机配件的工厂

means.word_mean: 1. put together out of components or parts;
2. make up something artificial or untrue

auth_sentence.content: It angers me that people would fabricate a story like that.
auth_sentence.res_content: It angers me that people would fabricate a story like that.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 织物;织品;结构;构造;建筑物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 捏造,编造[谎言,借口等];建造,制造

means.word_mean: 编造, 捏造, 虚构; 伪造

sentences.en: She fabricated a good excuse for staying home.
sentences.cn: 她编造了待在家里的借口。

sentences.en: The excuse for her absence was obviously fabricated.
sentences.cn: 她缺席的借口显然是瞎编的。

sentences.en: They plan to fabricate a cinema next year.
sentences.cn: 他们计划明年建造一座电影院。

sentences.en: This refrigerator is fabricated from parts made in different factories.
sentences.cn: 这台电冰箱是由不同的工厂所制的零件组装的。

jushi.english: The philosophers fabricated new theories of the universe.
jushi.chinese: 哲学家们创造了新的宇宙学说。

jushi.english: This refrigerator is fabricated from parts made in different factories.
jushi.chinese: 这台电冰箱是由不同的工厂所制的零件组装的。

jushi.english: She fabricated a good excuse for staying home.
jushi.chinese: 她编造了呆在家里的借口。
